programme.desc: A former television star waits out a scandal in Vermont. She becomes close with the innkeeper and his daughter while she helps him direct the local Christmas pageant.

programme.title: Santa Tell Me
programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Run
programme.desc: Self-described bookworm Avery is paired with retired hockey star Wes to compete in a holiday race across America. The team struggles through themed challenges until romance runs its course.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two travelers become linked when a snowstorm grounds their flight in Buffalo. Paige desperately needs to find a way to New York City to meet her fiance's parents, and it's up to Dylan, a fellow passenger and a guy she can't stand, to get her there.

programme.title: An Ice Palace Romance
programme.desc: A journalist faces old fears when she returns to her hometown ice rink to cover a story. With the help of the owner and his young daughter, she begins to reevaluate her life's purpose.

programme.title: Trivia at St. Nick's
programme.desc: Locals compete in a Christmas bar trivia tournament at the end of the semester.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season to Be Irish
programme.desc: Rose tries to flip a house in Ireland but is blocked by Sean, a handsome local who wants to preserve the historic cottage.

programme.title: Holiday Mismatch
programme.desc: New retiree Barb joins a Holiday Committee but clashes with long standing member Kath. When they realize their kids have started dating, they conspire to break up the happy couple.

programme.title: Christmas Next Door
programme.desc: Eric Randall, an author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays. Unsure of himself, Eric turns to his neighbor April, a lover of all things Christmas, for help.

programme.title: The Secret Gift of Christmas
programme.desc: A personal shopper helps her new client and recent widower reconnect with his young daughter, find them both everything on their wish list, and rediscover the joys of Christmas.

programme.title: Switched for Christmas
programme.desc: At their obligatory pre-Christmas lunch, estranged identical twins decide to swap lives up until Christmas Day.

programme.title: Cross Country Christmas
programme.desc: When a snowstorm disrupts both Lina's and Max's holiday plans, they realize they must work together to find a way home -- without taking it out on each other.

programme.title: Christmas in Notting Hill
programme.desc: Always too busy for love, famous soccer star Graham Savoy soon has a change of heart when he meets a visiting American during Christmastime.

programme.title: Everything Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her roommate embark on a road trip to Yuletide Springs, a town where Christmas is celebrated year-round.

programme.title: Hanukkah on the Rocks
programme.desc: Just one week before Hanukkah, corporate lawyer Tory is unemployed and questioning what's next. As she helps her Bubby prepare for the holiday, she embarks on a quest across Chicago to find Hanukka candles.

programme.title: Deck the Walls
programme.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

programme.title: Holiday Hotline
programme.desc: After leaving London, Abby works for a cooking hotline and connects with an anonymous caller, a single father who Abby is unknowingly smitten with in real life.

programme.title: Ghosts of Christmas Always
programme.desc: Katherine, a Ghost of Christmas Present, must help one soul rediscover his Christmas spirit, but this year has something unusual in store.

programme.title: The Holiday Sitter
programme.desc: Sam is a workaholic bachelor who's babysitting his niece and nephew during the holidays. Completely out of his element, he recruits help from a handsome neighbor and soon finds himself in an unexpected romance.

programme.title: Christmas in Rome
programme.desc: Angela, an American tour guide in Rome, agrees to teach a culture-shocked businessman named Oliver about the heart of Rome at Christmas.

programme.title: Round and Round
programme.desc: Rachel's stuck in a time loop, reliving the night of her parents' Hanukkah party. Can Zach, the nice boy grandma's trying to set her up with, help her make it to tomorrow?

programme.title: The Santa Class
programme.desc: Kate North, the owner of a struggling Santa School, and her instructor, Dan, must help an amnesia-stricken Santa Claus regain his memories to save Christmas and hopefully her school as well.

programme.title: Next Stop, Christmas
programme.desc: Angie wonders what life would be like if she had married an ex who became famous. When she finds herself magically transported into the past, Angie has the chance to relive that Christmas and learn what (and who) is truly important to her.

programme.title: Christmas Island
programme.desc: When a snowstorm diverts Kate's first private flight to Christmas Island, she must team up with an air traffic controller to secure her dream job as the family's pilot.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.title: A Novel Noel
programme.desc: A NYC book editor takes on a temporary gig running a Maine bookstore. Battling with the owners' son, she rediscovers her passion for nurturing creativity.

programme.title: Time for Us to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Five guests are mysteriously invited to an inn to celebrate Christmas and soon investigate their connection to each other.

programme.title: The Christmas Promise
programme.desc: Nicole learns to deal with grief, with the help of her grandfather and a carpenter she hires to renovate the home that was once meant for her and her fiancé.

programme.title: 'Twas the Night Before Christmas
programme.desc: A former actress takes charge of a town's annual Christmas Eve courtroom production, in which the true authorship of the famous poem "A Visit From St. Nick" is debated.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas
programme.desc: Life deals Zoey Hathaway a strange blow when she inherits a reindeer farm and becomes buried in taking care of the animals and all of the Christmas responsibilities.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's A Mrs. Miracle Christmas
programme.desc: When members of a family face loneliness and lose faith, Mrs. Miracle swoops in to renew their Christmas spirit.

programme.title: A Cookie Cutter Christmas
programme.desc: Two schoolteachers take their rivalry to a new level while they scramble to win a holiday baking contest and the affections of a handsome single father.

programme.title: Christmas Sail
programme.desc: When Liz returns home to take care of her estranged father, she is determined to give her daughter a perfect Christmas.

programme.title: Eight Gifts of Hanukkah
programme.desc: An anonymous suitor sends optometrist Sara a gift for each night of Hanukkah, and on her journey to find her secret admirer, she learns her one true love might be someone she never expected.

programme.title: My Christmas Dream
programme.desc: A department store manager sets out to create an amazing holiday display window to impress the owner. She asks a recently-fired employee to help her make the display, and as they work together, they start to fall in love.

programme.title: A Gift to Remember
programme.desc: A hopeless romantic, Darcy, insists on being swept off her feet. One day, while bicycling to work, Darcy crashes into a sharply dressed man walking his dog. He falls into a coma; she takes the dog home, waiting to reunite him with his owner.

programme.title: A Veteran's Christmas
programme.desc: Capt. Grace Garland, a decorated U.S. veteran, returns home after two tours of search and rescue in Afghanistan. After being separated from her beloved K9 partner, Grace must rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: The Christmas Note
programme.desc: Gretchen returns to her hometown and meets her neighbor Melissa. They form a reluctant friendship when Melissa discovers she has a sibling she never knew about, and through their detective work, they uncover a huge surprise.

programme.title: Time for Them to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A woman with amnesia catches a ride with her handsome nurse to investigate the only clue to her identity: a newspaper clipping for a Christmas festival with a cryptic invitation.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: Deliver by Christmas
programme.desc: Bakery owner Molly meets Josh, a newcomer in town, but is also enchanted by a mysterious client whom she's never met in person. A special wish to be delivered by Christmas could help determine who will win Molly's heart.

programme.title: Home for Christmas Day
programme.desc: A young woman begins a long-distance relationship with an active-duty soldier. Her mother tries to steer her away from the relationship to save her feelings.

programme.title: Merry & Bright
programme.desc: Merry and Bright Candy Cane Company owner Cate meets a man during the busy Christmas season and assumes he is the suitor her mother is trying to set her up with.

programme.title: Christmas in My Heart
programme.desc: Violinist Beth returns home after the recent death of her mother and tutors the daughter of a reclusive country music star to prepare her for the upcoming holiday concert.

programme.title: Family for Christmas
programme.desc: After an offhand wish to a man playing Santa Claus, a woman wakes up to find herself married to her college sweetheart.

programme.title: Christmas in Angel Falls
programme.desc: Guardian angel Gabby is sent to the town of Angel Falls to restore its Christmas spirit. As she helps the townspeople to revive their traditions, Gabby meets a volunteer fire chief who teaches her the truth about the love she admires from afar.

programme.title: Christmas at Grand Valley
programme.desc: Kelly returns to Grand Valley for Christmas. When Leo, a single dad, arrives in town with his kids to review a hotel, the two cross paths. As Kelly re-experiences traditions with Leo, she begins to find her way back to her passion for art.

programme.title: Karen Kingsbury's Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Maggie tries to maintain the balance of being a mother and having a career. When her son Jordan needs help at school, he meets Casey, a tutor, and the two quickly bond. As Casey becomes a father figure, Jordan wishes his mom could find love again.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: Five Gold Rings
programme.desc: An artist returns home for the holidays and gets tasked with a Christmas quest left by her grandmother. She and the local PI must return lost items to their owners before Christmas.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: A NASA rep (Billy Bob Thornton) recruits an oil driller (Bruce Willis) and his team of mavericks to save Earth from an oncoming asteroid.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Aided by Tinker Bell (Julia Roberts), a corporate lawyer (Robin Williams) turns into Peter Pan to rescue his children from Captain Hook (Dustin Hoffman).

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Aided by Tinker Bell (Julia Roberts), a corporate lawyer (Robin Williams) turns into Peter Pan to rescue his children from Captain Hook (Dustin Hoffman).

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Following an attack on his convoy in Iraq, a man (Ryan Reynolds) awakes in a coffin with little more than a lighter, a cell phone and his building anxiety.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Who Has Access to Your Personal Data?
programme.desc: Even if YOU do everything right to protect yourself, company and institutional data breaches are out of your control. Nearly 1 out of 4 US consumers have been a victim of identity theft. Find out how LifeLock can help protect your identity.

programme.title: Operation Smile
programme.desc: Operation Smile: transforming lives and bringing smiles to children around the world.

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!
programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: A man (Jude Law) who repossesses organs from indebted transplant patients goes on the run when he cannot make the payments on his own artificial heart.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Troubled people attempt to mend their lives as they brace themselves for a comet that threatens Earth.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: America's national security team must rely on a disgraced former guard (Gerard Butler) to save the president (Aaron Eckhart) after terrorists seize control of the White House, taking the chief of state hostage.

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
programme.desc: Robbed of his birthright, Arthur grows up the hard way in the back alleys of the city, not knowing who he truly is. When fate leads him to pull the Excalibur sword from stone, Arthur embraces his true destiny to become a legendary fighter and leader.

programme.title: Fudbal: Zalivski kup: Bahrain - Iraq
programme.desc: Svake druge godine, fudbalske reprezentacije Bahreina, Iraka, Kuvajta, Omana, Katara, Saudijske Arabije, Ujedinjenih Arapskih Emirata i Jemena okupljaju se u borbi za pobedu na prestižnom Zalivskom...

programme.title: Koledž košarka: Diamond Head Classic (Honolulu) - za 7. mesto
programme.desc: NCAA je najpoznatiji košarkaški turnir univerziteta na svetu! Obavezno i ovog proleća pratite ko će biti najbolja univerzitetska ekipa u SAD-u i koje će možda buduće NBA zvezde zablistati.

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Gil Vicente - Sporting
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika.

programme.title: Na današnji dan
programme.desc: Podsećanje na godišnjice uspeha sportista, klubova i reprezentacije koji su se dogodili na današnji dan.

programme.title: 50 godina sporta
programme.desc: Kako su se sport i sportisti razvijali tokom godina kroz oko moderne tehnologije. Ko je kada rođen i šta je sve postigao. Saznajte činjenice koje možda niste znali o svom omiljenom igraču ili vozaču.

programme.title: Košarka - Slovenački kup: 1/4 Finale (1st leg): Krka - Domžale
programme.desc: Pratite utakmice košarkaškog kupa Slovenije koji se od 1992. godine održava u organizaciji Košarkaškog saveza Slovenije. (LIVE).

programme.title: Trans World Sport
programme.desc: Interesantne priče i neobični sportovi iz svih delova sveta. Uvek ćete biti u toku uz ovu emisiju.

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Maccabi - Zalgiris
programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju. (LIVE).
